svg.title: DP-01: Adaptive Planning Framework Architecture
svg.desc: Comprehensive framework showing transformation from static Gantt charts to dynamic, AI-enhanced planning systems that adapt to changing requirements and team velocity. Demonstrates the architectural shift required to move from traditional project management to adaptive, intelligence-driven planning.
svg.text: From Static Gantt Chart Graveyards to Dynamic Intelligence Systems
Traditional project management - rigid and fragile

g.text: Uncontrolled expansion crushing timelines and budgets
Critical issues surfacing when it's too expensive to fix
Team members over-allocated with no dynamic rebalancing
Result: 68% of projects fail to meet original scope, timeline, or budget

svg.text: Adaptive project management - responsive and resilient

g.text: Early detection and proactive issue resolution
Dynamic reallocation based on real velocity and needs
Result: 89% success rate with 40% better resource utilization

svg.text: Interconnected layers that work together to create intelligence-driven planning systems
Click components to explore detailed functionality, run simulations, and configure implementations
üìä Success Metrics & Adaptive Planning Value Demonstration

g.text: through reduced waste and faster delivery

svg.text: üìã Technical: SVG with interactive framework system | 120KB max | Mobile responsive | Offline capable | WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility
